articles.title: This ETF Caught a Major Tailwind After the Fed’s Rate Cut
articles.mainIdea: This ETF Caught a Major Tailwind After the Fed’s Rate Cut
articles.summary: MarketBeat: This ETF Caught a Major Tailwind After the Fed’s Rate Cut. Following the Federal Reserve’s third and final interest rate cut of 2025, this financials sector ETF is poised to profit in the year ahead. Related tickers mentioned: AXP, BAC, BLK, BRK-B, BX, C, GS, JPM, MA, MS, MS-PQ, SCHW, V, VFAIX, VFH, WFC, ^GSPC.

articles.title: More Fed Rate Cuts in 2026? ETFs to Play the Opportunities
articles.mainIdea: More Fed Rate Cuts in 2026? ETFs to Play the Opportunities
articles.summary: Zacks: More Fed Rate Cuts in 2026? ETFs to Play the Opportunities. Softer inflation and dovish signals point to more 2026 rate cuts. These ETFs can help investors ride potential gains. Related tickers mentioned: FDIS, FXD, IJR, IWM, IYF, KBWB, NAESX, SCHA, VB, VCDAX, VCR, VFAIX, VFH, VSCIX, VSCPX, VSMAX, XLF, XLY.
